TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit InputBindingCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public NotInheritable Class InputBindingCollection Implements IList
public ref class InputBindingCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type InputBindingCollection = class interface ICollection interface IEnumerable interface IList
type InputBindingCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

Docs.summary: 表示 对象的有序集合。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 派生自 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> 的所有对象都具有一个名为 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.InputBindings%2A>的 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection>。 派生自 <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement> 的所有对象都具有一个名为 <xref:System.Windows.ContentElement.InputBindings%2A>的 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection>。
但是，如果在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]中设置这些集合，则集合中的项必须是 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> 的派生类，而不是直接 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> 对象。 这是因为 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> 不支持默认公共构造函数。 因此，在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 中设置的 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> 中的项通常是一个支持默认公共构造函数的 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBinding> 派生类，如 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> 或 <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseBinding>。
## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> 并将其与 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>相关联。 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> 将添加到 <xref:System.Windows.Window>上的 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> 中。
[!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)]
[!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)]

remarks.format:
## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyGesture> 并将其与 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding>相关联。 <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyBinding> 将添加到 <xref:System.Windows.Window>上的 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection> 中。
[!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)]
[!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)]
[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 的示例并不真正使用 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection.Add%2A>，但 <xref:System.Windows.Input.InputBindingCollection.Add%2A> 由对集合的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 处理支持进行隐式调用。 有关 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] 和集合的详细信息，请参阅[XAML 概述（WPF）](/dotnet/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf)。
